Headline: No Trains Between Jefferson Park and Montrose
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Jefferson Park and Montrose due to HAZMAT situation.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Jefferson Park and Montrose due to a HAZMAT situation.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between O'Hare and Jefferson Park, and,
  • between Montrose and Forest Park, only.

Shuttle buses have been requested between Jefferson Park and Montrose to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
